duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop components for a software application platform to produce enterprise-level reporting based on financial statements and models.
Develop and support the middle layer of the application to build, test, and deploy RESTful microservices while collaborating with other Dev teams, Dev Ops, and User Interface teams.
Write high-quality software code and automated tests for web interface applications integrating data, analytics, and reporting components.
Ensure production resilience, high availability, and system performance over large datasets.
Pick up new technologies and contribute to story tasks including design, code, test, CI/CD, and deployment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Financial Engineering, Computer Science, or a related discipline (Master’s preferred)
